panel.title: Broken references
panel.html:
References might be broken becasue of a several reasons:
Syntax issue in SPL of SimpleXML
The referenced KO does not exist
The referenced KO is private, while it is referenced from a shared KO
The referenced KO resides in another app, but it is not shared globally

search.query: | where destination like "BROKEN REFERENCE: %" | rex field=source "^((?<private>private) )?(?<type>[\\w ]+) (?<owner>[^:]+):(?<app>[^:]+):(?<title>.+)$" | eval private=if(isnull(private),0,1) | search type=$type|s$ app=$app|s$ owner=$owner|s$ private=$private$ | rename destination as reference | table private type owner app title relation reference

panel.title: Unreferenced knowledge objects
panel.html: Especially for KO's other than dashboards and saved searches this suggests they are unused.

search.query: | join fqn type=inner [ | loadjob savedsearch="thunn500:ko_dependencies:ko_all_dependencies" | table destination | rename destination as fqn ] | eval private=if(sharing="user",0,1) | search type=$type|s$ app=$app|s$ owner=$owner|s$ private=$private$ | table private type owner app title
